survey_name: Customer Feedback Survey for Pet Food Brands
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from pet owners about their preferences, satisfaction, and purchasing behaviors regarding pet food brands.

questions.question_text: What type of pet(s) do you own?
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow selection of multiple pet types. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for specification.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an 'Other' option triggering a text input if selected.

script.question_text: What type of pet(s) do you own?

questions.question_text: Which pet food brand(s) do you currently purchase for your pet(s)?
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow selection of multiple brands. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for specification.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an 'Other' option triggering a text input if selected.

script.question_text: Which pet food brand(s) do you currently purchase for your pet(s)?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of the pet food you currently purchase?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction. Ensure the scale is balanced and clearly labeled.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with radio buttons.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of the pet food you currently purchase?

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when selecting pet food? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow selection of multiple factors. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for specification.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when selecting pet food? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you purchase pet food?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format with clear frequency options.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with radio buttons.

script.question_text: How often do you purchase pet food?

questions.question_text: Where do you typically purchase pet food?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format with an 'Other' option for specification.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with radio buttons and an 'Other' text input.

script.question_text: Where do you typically purchase pet food?

questions.question_text: Have you ever switched pet food brands?
questions.client_notes: Use a simple yes/no question to determine brand loyalty.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with radio buttons.

script.question_text: Have you ever switched pet food brands?

questions.question_text: If yes, what was the primary reason for switching?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format with an 'Other' option for specification.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with radio buttons and an 'Other' text input.

script.question_text: If yes, what was the primary reason for switching?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your current pet food brand to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring recommendation likelihood. Ensure the scale is balanced and clearly labeled.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with radio buttons.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your current pet food brand to others?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in the pet food you purchase?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: OPEN_TEXT with a text input box.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in the pet food you purchase?
